examples: She opened her mouth to say something.
Abrió la boca para decir algo.
His mouth twisted into a wry smile.
Su boca se torció en una sonrisa irónica.
Their mouths fell open (= they were surprised).
Sus bocas se abrieron (= se sorprendieron).
Don't talk with your mouth full (= when eating).
No hables con la boca llena (= al comer).
